OrgName.entry: CHILD AND ADOLESCENT MENTAL HEALTH SERVICE DIRECTORATE (CAMHS)

Desc.entry: Provides a specialist service to children and young people aged up to 16 years who are experiencing difficulties which are seriously impacting on their mental health and emotional wellbeing. Works with families and carers. The service operates from 3 locations serving different parts of the city and encompasses specialist services: the Tier 4 service operating from the Becton Centre, a Dual Diagnosis team, Multi-Agency Psychological Support for Looked After Children (see separate entry) and CAMHS Forensic Services. Referral via GP, educational psychologist or Social Worker.

ProvisionPlace.entry: Becton Centre for Children and Young People
